text.page:
233
096-117a @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus kyi zag pa sbyin par gtang ba'i gzungs/ mchil ma la/ oM AHsh+le Sh+mA ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ lud pa la/ o~M AHkhre ra A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ snabs la/ o~M AHsiM g+ha na A ha re b+h+yaHswA tA/ lus kyi dri ma la/ o~M AH ma la A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ dri chen la/ o~M AHbi Ta A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ dri chu la/ o~M AHmu tra A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ de rnams so so la de dag za ba rnams kyis thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /se gol brdab bo/ /de rnams de ltar byin pa'i bsod nams ci bsags pa thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du byang chub tu bsdo bar bya'o/ /'di dag ni bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdo rgyud nas byung ste/ ba ri lo ts+tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// //
